gt_text: Sip, savor, slow down Fall Coffee Festival Limited edition fall flavors now available Pumpkin spice is back Curated blends for sweater weather
juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element the final image must contain:

*   Title "Fall Coffee Festival" (in elegant serif font, dark brown lettering, at top center)
*   Small yellow tagline "Sip, savor, slow down" (positioned above the title)
*   Cream-colored label with text "Limited edition fall flavors now available" (positioned below the title)
*   Steaming cup of coffee
*   Wooden table (supporting the coffee cup and other items)
*   Fallen leaves (surrounding the coffee cup on the table)
*   Cinnamon sticks (on the table)
*   Cozy scarf (on the table)
*   Book (on the table)
*   Background park (depicted in autumn colors)
*   Softly falling leaves (in the background)
*   Coffee brand logo (centered at the bottom of the poster)
*   Text "Pumpkin spice is back"
*   Text "Curated blends for sweater weather"
*   QR code (for online ordering)
